title: The Lil Weirdo Interview: San Diego, Turning Down Millions, The N Word & More
description:
Lil Weirdo finally made his way for a proper sit down with Adam and Doknow, to talk about his come-up, San Diego being underrated, and more!

-----
Try BlueChew FREE when you use our promo code Adam22 at checkout--just
pay $5 shipping. That’s http://www.BlueChew.com , promo code Adam22 to receive your first month FREE -- and we thank BlueChew for sponsoring the podcast
-----

00:00 Intro
0:34 - Popping up on ATEOTD going back and forth over San Diego vs LA, Sharp holding it down
5:02 - Adam catching fades in San Diego
5:23 - Mom was a gang member but tried to keep him out the streets
9:05 - How he got the name Lil Weirdo from his dad “Big Weirdo”, the word “Weirdo” having a different meaning
12:26 - Bluechew AD
16:09 - Adam’s first threesome was in Tijuana for 40 bucks
18:01 - Foosgonewild never reached out to the younger artist from the city
20:38 - Not being signed but having plenty of offers, turning down a deal for over a million
22:44 - Doknow always showing love, the younger generation of Mexican creators and artists breaking barriers
26:49 - Not caring about Tyga “Ay! Caramba!” song, would’ve gotten on song if Tyga asked
31:31 - Doknow speaks on OG Cholo not liking his take on the song
37:47 - San Diego prosecutors using lyrics to wrongly convict man, man winning a settlement
39:38 - Rob Stone having the biggest song out of his city, smoking at his condo, Nick Cannon being from the city
43:56 - It is regular for Mexican kids growing up around blacks to use N word, Not using it in his music
47:58 - Not wanting to speak on beef, being a street foo who became a rapper, Top 5 rappers in San Diego Lil Maru, KT Foreign, Siete etc
51:21 - Thinking it’s time he should sign to a label and get the machine behind him
-----
